title: Cell Cycle
author: ayobami
description: viewing the cell cycle in some detail. Watch out though, not to get confused by the colors

questions.question: example(s) of cells in the 2B stage
f(G1)
questions.answer: cell growth. has a checkpoint to ensure everything is right for DNA synthesis
questions.text: match `f(cell cycle stage)` and the stage's description

questions.question: f(G2)
questions.answer: cell growth. has a checkpoint to ensure everything is right for mitosis
questions.text: match `f(cell cycle stage)` and the stage's description

questions.question: f(S)
questions.text: match `f(cell cycle stage)` and the stage's description

questions.question: f(M)
questions.answer: cell division to form two diploid child cells
questions.text: match `f(cell cycle stage)` and the stage's description

questions.question: f(G0)
questions.answer: the cell has left the cycle and has stopped dividing
questions.text: match `f(cell cycle stage)` and the stage's description
